item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US Space Force warns of ‘mind-boggling’ build-up of Chinese capabilities
2. Trump says Liz Cheney is ‘war hawk’ who should face ‘guns trained on her’
3. Israeli secret services make arrests in leak probe in PM’s office
4. Budget poses new challenge for UK public finances, Moody’s warns
5. Starmer vows tough reforms and seeks to calm markets
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
